reviewText: good kids cartoon not bad for adult watching I enjoyed myself couldn't get up until I watched all the episodes

I think this dvd is ok its fun to watch I saw some of the episodes and I liked it the guy that does sasuke voice is on there. Witch is cool O and by the way Your comment says that the dvd has episodes 6-8,but the other comment says episodes 6-9 I just wanted to know. So If anyone happens to read this can let me know by posting a comment next to the dvd thanks.
My son and I enjoyed watching the dvd. The story line is easy to follow and artisty is very good. It completed the set of 3 dvds of the blue dragon.
